alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Lamar; Monroe; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 5:56PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Spalding, northern Monroe, Butts, southwestern Jasper and Lamar Counties through 630 PM EST... At 555 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Goggins, or over Barnesville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Jackson, Forsyth, Flovilla, Milner, Orchard Hill, Aldora, Goggins, Berner, McKibben, Chappel Mill, High Falls State Park, Redbone, Blount, Liberty Hill, Collier, Johnstonville and Indian Springs State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
